text: 《静夜思》床前 明月 光，疑是 地上 霜。举头 望 明月，低头 思 故乡。Buy on Amazon:Kindle Li Bai biography or his poems in English.
translation:
Before my bed the bright moon’s glow,
seems like frost on the ground.
I raise my head and gaze at the bright moon,
I lower my head and think of my hometown.
pinyin: jìng yè sī chuáng qián míngyuè guāng yí shì dìshang shuāng jǔ tóu wàng míngyuè dītóu sī gùxiāng
